person.persName: William H. Kirtley (Rockcastle County, Kentucky, merchant, attorney, court clerk, and soldier)

body.p: Rockcastle County, Kentucky, merchant, attorney, court clerk, and soldier. Kentucky native. Married Elizabeth H. Kirtley. Father of Mary C. Kirtley, William L. Kirtley, and Ann Kirtley. Merchant and Assistant Marshal for the Census of the United States in Rockcastle County in 1850. Attorney in Mount Vernon, Kentucky, in 1860. Private in the Rockcastle and Lincoln County Home Guards from May 1862 to July 1862. Clerk of the Rockcastle Circuit Court from 1862 to 1863.
